com.github.parmag.fixefid.record.field

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.parmag.fixefid.record.field.Field

  • public class Field
extends Object
    The Field represents a fixed field formatted text.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giancarlo Parma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Field(String name, int index, int subIndex, int occurIndex, FieldType type, int len, FieldMandatory mandatory, RecordWay recordWay, String defaultValue, List<String> fixedValues, List<FieldExtendedProperty> fieldExtendedProperties, String displayName, String description)
      Constructs a new Field that represents the fixed field formatted text

      void toAscii()
      Apply the encoding with the Charset "US-ASCII" to the value of this if this field is a String Every character out of the Charset "US-ASCII" present in the value of this field is replaced with the character ?.
      void toNormalize()
      Applay toUpperCase, toRemoveAccents and toAscii to the value of this field.
      void toRemoveAccents()
      Apply the method toRemoveAccents to the value of this field if this field is a String Every character with accent present in the value of this field is replaced with the relative character without accent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Field

        public Field(String name,
             int index,
             int subIndex,
             int occurIndex,
             FieldType type,
             int len,
             FieldMandatory mandatory,
             RecordWay recordWay,
             String defaultValue,
             List<String> fixedValues,
             List<FieldExtendedProperty> fieldExtendedProperties,
             String displayName,
             String description)
        Constructs a new Field that represents the fixed field formatted text
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Field
        index - the index of this Field
        subIndex - the sub-index of this Field
        occurIndex - the occur index
        type - the type of this Field
        len - the len of this Field
        mandatory - the mandatory type of this Field
        recordWay - the record way type of this Field
        defaultValue - the default value of this Field
        fixedValues - the pipe separated list of valid values of this Field
        fieldExtendedProperties - the field extended properties of this Field
        displayName - the display name of this Field
        description - the description of this Field

      • isMandatory

        public boolean isMandatory()
        Returns true if this Field is mandatory. This field is mandatory if
        • FieldMandatory.INOUT
        • FieldMandatory.IN and RecordWay.IN.
        • FieldMandatory.OUT and RecordWay.OUT
        Returns:
        true if this Field is mandatory

      • isString

        public boolean isString()
        Returns true if this field is a String. This field is a String if

        FieldType.AN

        Returns:
        true if this field is a String.

      • isLong

        public boolean isLong()
        Returns true if this field is a Long. This field is a Long if

        FieldType.N and decimal format is not present and len ≥ 10

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Long.

      • isInteger

        public boolean isInteger()
        Returns true if this field is a Integer. This field is a Integer if

        FieldType.N and decimal format is not present and len < 10

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Integer.

      • isDate

        public boolean isDate()
        Returns true if this field is a Date. This field is a Date if

        FieldType.AN and date format is present

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Date.

      • isBoolean

        public boolean isBoolean()
        Returns true if this field is a Boolean. This field is a Boolean if

        FieldType.AN and boolean format is not present

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Boolean.

      • isDouble

        public boolean isDouble()
        Returns true if this field is a Double. This field is a Double if

        FieldType.N and decimal format is present and len ≥ 10

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Double.

      • isFloat

        public boolean isFloat()
        Returns true if this field is a Float. This field is a Float if

        FieldType.N and decimal format is not present and len < 10

        Returns:
        true if this field is a Float.

      • isBigDecimal

        public boolean isBigDecimal()
        Returns true if this field is a BigDecimal. This field is a BigDecimal if

        FieldType.N and decimal format is present

        Returns:
        true if this field is a BigDecimal.

      • isNumericSpace

        protected boolean isNumericSpace(String value)
        Return true if the value param is a numeric space. That's

        FieldType.N and value.trim().isEmpty() is true

        Parameters:
        value - the value to check if is a numeric space
        Returns:
        true if the value param si a numeric space

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a String object representing this field. The returned string is composed with the params value of this field
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a string representation of this field

      • toUpperCase

        public void toUpperCase()
        Apply the method String.toUpperCase(java.util.Locale) to the value of this field if this field is a String

      • toRemoveAccents

        public void toRemoveAccents()
        Apply the method toRemoveAccents to the value of this field if this field is a String

        Every character with accent present in the value of this field is replaced with the relative character without accent. For example the character is replaced with the character a

      • toAscii

        public void toAscii()
        Apply the encoding with the Charset "US-ASCII" to the value of this if this field is a String

        Every character out of the Charset "US-ASCII" present in the value of this field is replaced with the character ?. For example the character is replaced with the character ?

      • toNormalize

        public void toNormalize()
        Applay toUpperCase, toRemoveAccents and toAscii to the value of this field.

      • getValidationInfo

        public FieldValidationInfo getValidationInfo()
        Returns:
        the validation info of this field

      • resetStatus

        public void resetStatus()
        Reset the status of this field to RecordFieldValidationStatus.INFO, the code to zero and the message to empty string
